content: times slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 9 thumb round 4t - chain 1 single_crochet around all stitches slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 9 thumb round 5t - chain 1 single_crochet around all stitches slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 9 thumb round 6t - chain 1 single_crochet around all stitches slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 9 note you can add or remove rounds of single_crochet s to get a longer or shorter thumb as required thumb round 7t - chain 1 single_crochet decrease repeat around 2 more times slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 6 cut yarn leaving a good length of tail for weaving top of thumb closed fasten_off yarn bring yarn tail to inside of thumb turn thumb inside out and weave thumb closed from the inside of mitt by weaving in and out of the 6 stitches remaining at the top of the thumb pull yarn tight to close not too tight as to accidentally break the yarn and ensure the closure is secured properly weave in all remaining ends enjoy your country comfort mittens hashtag your finished mitts #countrycomfortmitts on instagram i d love to see your finished work if you have any questions you can email me at inslstitches@gmail com please note - you can sell the mitts you make from this pattern but please credit my shop in stitches by providing links to either @inslstitches on instagram or in stitches - crochet by sl at www facebook com/inslstitches on facebook or inslstitches at www etsy com/shop/inslstitches on etsy or inslstitches on ravelry please do not alter rewrite share or sell this pattern in any capacity this pattern was created for personal use with the only exception being the selling of the items you make from it thank you your cooperation is much appreciated country comfort mittens page 3 of 3 copyright © 2018 in stitches crochet by sl
